sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react";
import axios from 'axios'
import Parser from 'html-react-parser';

class Main extends Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);

        this.state = {
            headerImage: '',
            artwork_content: '',
            artworks: [],
            artist_image: '',
            artist_content: '',
            email_content: '',
        }
    }

    componentDidMount() {
        axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/home/').then(response => {
            let data = response.data.data
            this.setState({
                headerImage: data.header_image,
                artwork_content: data.artwork_content,
                artworks: data.artworks,
                artist_image: data.artist_image,
                artist_content: data.artist_content,
                email_content: data.email_content,
            })
        }).catch(error => {

        })

        window.addEventListener('scroll', this.handleScroll);
    }

    componentWillUnmount() {
        window.removeEventListener('scroll', this.handleScroll);
    }

    handleScroll(event) {
        let scrollTop = event.srcElement.body.scrollTop,
            elementOffset = this.instance.getBoundingClientRect().top;
            // itemTranslate = Math.min(0,  1 - (scrollTop - elementOffset)/786);

        if( scrollTop > elementOffset ){
                let a = document.getElementsByClassName('parallax-container').getElementsByTagName('test');
                $(this).css("opacity", 1 - (scrollTop - elementOffset)/786);
        }

        // this.setState({
        //     transform: itemTranslate
        // });
    }

    render() {

        const {headerImage, artwork_content, artworks, artist_image, artist_content, email_content} = this.state

        return (
            < div
        className = "wrapper home" >
            < section
        className = "main-banner" >
            < div
        className = "parallax-container" >
            < img
        src = {headerImage}
        className = "cover-bg"
        alt = "background" / >
            < /div>
            < h2
        className = "generic-title" > < img
        src = "logo.svg"
        className = "logo" / > < /h2>

            < nav
        className = "navigation top-menu" >
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#1" > ARTWORK < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#2" > ABOUT < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#3" > CONNECT < /a>
            < /nav>
            < /section>
            < section
        className = "container grid parallax-container page-section hero"
        id = "1" >
            < nav
        className = "navigation menu" >
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#1" > ARTWORK < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#2" > ABOUT < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#3" > CONNECT < /a>
            < /nav>
            < div
        className = "heading" >
            {Parser(artwork_content)}
            < /div>
            < div
        className = "grid-inner" >
            {
                artworks.map(artwork => < div >
                    < img src = {artwork.image}  className = "img-fluid" / > < p > {artwork.name} < /p>
                < /div>)

            }
            < /div>
            < /section>
            < section
        className = "container page-section parallax-container  hero"
        id = "2" >
            < nav
        className = "navigation menu" >
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#1" > ARTWORK < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#2" > ABOUT < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#3" > CONNECT < /a>
            < /nav>
            < /section>


            < section
        className = "middle-section parallax-container" >
            < div
        className = "row" >
            < div
        className = "col-lg-5 col-md-4" >
            < img
        src = {artist_image}
        className = "author-img"
        alt = "author" / >

            < p
        className = "photo-copyright" >© Photo
        by < a
        href = "#" > Michel
        Lunardelli < /a></
        p >
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "col-lg-7 col-md-8 description-right" >
            {Parser(artist_content)}
            < /div>
            < /div>
            < /section>
            < section
        className = "container page-section hero"
        id = "3" >
            < nav
        className = "navigation menu"
        id = "mainNav" >
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#1" > ARTWORK < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#2" > ABOUT < /a>
            < a
        className = "navigation__link"
        href = "#3" > CONNECT < /a>
            < /nav>
            < /section>
            < section
        className = "container parallax-container form-banner  hero" >
            < div
        className = "heading" >
            {Parser(email_content)}
            < /div>
            < div
        className = "form-banner-inner" >

            < form >
            < div
        className = "checkbox-panel" >
            < div
        className = "md-checkbox" >
            < input
        id = "check1"
        type = "checkbox"
        checked / >
        < label
        for= "check1" > Inquire about
        originalwork
        by
        Robert. < /label>
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "md-checkbox" >
            < input
        id = "check2"
        type = "checkbox"
        checked / >
        < label
        for= "check2" > Inquire about
        Robert’s
        limited
        edition
        prints
        and
        sculpture. < /label>
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "md-checkbox" >
            < input
        id = "check3"
        type = "checkbox"
        checked / >
        < label
        for= "check3" > To receive
        a
        very
        occasional
        newsletter
        from
        Robert’s
        studio
        please
        sign
        up
        here. < /label>
        < /div>
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "form-panel" >
            < div
        className = "form-group" >
            < input
        type = "text"
        required = "required" / >
            < label
        className = "control-label" > Email < /label>
            < /div>
            < div
        className = "form-group" >
            < input
        type = "text"
        required = "required" / >
            < label
        className = "control-label" > Phone
        Number < /label>
        < /div>
        < div
        className = "form-group" >
            < input
        type = "text"
        required = "required" / >
            < label
        className = "control-label" > Name < /label>
            < /div>
            < /div>

            < div
        className = "form-group" >
            < textarea
        required = "required" > < /textarea>
            < label
        className = "control-label" > Messages < /label>
            < /div>
            < button
        type = "button"
        className = "send-btn button" > Send < /button>
            < /form>

            < /div>
            < /section>
            < footer >

            < /footer>
            < /div>
    )
    }
}

export default Main
